ygData.subject: Here we go!
ygData.msgSnippet: Alright than. Let go! Countdown:5.....4.....3.....2.....1.....go! The engines turned on and the Iron Ram slowly began to hover above the ground. Brix

"Alright than. Let' go! Countdown:5.....4.....3.....2.....1.....go!"

The engines turned on and the Iron Ram slowly began to hover above 
the ground. Brix titlted it so the nose was on an angle facing 
upward. Brix than pressed a button, and the engines went on full 
force as the ship started to go. Up an up, past the clouds, until it 
finaly cleared the atmosphere and was at the edge of space. 
Brixslowed down.

"Alright. It looks like it's gonna be a few mega-cycles, so you guys 
can just chill."

Fliq turned to look at Ramulus.

"So, what did you get up to after you left The Ark?"
